short_summary: Procurement of Filter Elements for Air Conditioning
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.
date_posted: There are no specific details about the date posted. The procurement notice was posted on 02 February 2023, but it is unclear if it was a precise date or a time.
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal

## Tender Information

* **Title**: NSN: 20-0097029, Filter Element, Air Conditioning
* **Reference Number**: PW-23-01024511
* **Solicitation Number**: W8482-229735/B
* **Publication Date**: 2023-02-02
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-03-02 14:00:00
* **Region(s)**: Nova Scotia and British Columbia

## Notice Details

* **Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

## Items and Quantities

* **Item 1**: NSN: 20-0097029, Filter Element, Air Conditioning (72 units) to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* **Item 2**: NSN: 20-0097029, Filter Element, Air Conditioning (72 units) to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

## Mandatory Requirements

* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars.
* Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name, model, and NCAGE number.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Contact Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defence
* **Contact Name**: Neil Trousdale
* **Contact Email**: [neil.trousdale@forces.gc.ca](mailto:neil.trousdale@forces.gc.ca)

## Documents

* The Request for Proposal (RFP) document is available for download on the Canada Buys website: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/)

Note: The rewritten text has been condensed to the most relevant information and formatted in a clear and consistent manner.

Key Changes:

* Simplified language and structure
* Removed unnecessary information
* Made it easier to read and understand
* Emphasized the most important details
* Included relevant links and contact information
